query:
-- عرض النتائج
SELECT 
  u.name,
  u.email,
  r.name_ar AS role_name,
  ur.assigned_at
FROM user_roles ur
JOIN users u ON ur.user_id = u.id
JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE u.openId LIKE 'test_%'
ORDER BY ur.assigned_at DESC;
